name: pWebArc
description: Personal Private Passive Web Archive is a suite of tools to collect, save, mirror, manage archives of (i.e. hoard), and view web pages and whole websites offline.
author: Jan Malakhovski

toggle-tabconfig-tracking.description: Toggle tracking in the current tab

toggle-tabconfig-children-tracking.description: Toggle tracking in current tab's newly opened children

take-all-inlimbo-tab.description: From limbo, queue for archival all reqres related to the current tab

discard-all-inlimbo-tab.description: From limbo, discard all reqres related to the current tab
